introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: What is RandomDraw
introduce.label: Introduction
introduce.description: RandomDraw is a creative platform that generates random drawing ideas and inspiration for artists of all skill levels.

items.title: Instant Inspiration
items.description: Generate unique drawing ideas with just one click, customized to your skill level and preferences.

items.title: Various Categories
items.description: Choose from different categories like animals, landscapes, characters, objects, and more.

items.title: Style Options
items.description: Select from various art styles including cute, simple, realistic, abstract, and cartoon.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: Why Choose RandomDraw
benefit.label: Benefits
benefit.description: Enhance your creativity and artistic journey with our unique features and tools.

items.title: Overcome Artist's Block
items.description: Never stare at a blank canvas again. Get fresh ideas whenever creativity runs dry.

items.title: Skill-Based Suggestions
items.description: Find ideas perfectly matched to your skill level, from beginner to advanced.

items.title: Community Sharing
items.description: Share your creations with a supportive community of fellow artists and get feedback.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How to Use RandomDraw
usage.description: Get started with RandomDraw in three simple steps:

items.title: Select Your Parameters
items.description: Choose your skill level, preferred style, and subject category to narrow down options.

items.title: Generate Ideas
items.description: Click the generate button to get a random drawing idea tailored to your preferences.

items.title: Start Drawing
items.description: Use the provided idea to start your creative process, with optional reference images and tips.

items.title: Share Your Creation
items.description: Upload your finished artwork to share with the community and participate in challenges.

feature.name: feature
feature.title: RandomDraw Features
feature.description: Everything you need to boost your creativity and artistic skills.

items.title: Random Idea Generator
items.description: Generate endless unique drawing prompts filtered by category, style, and difficulty.

items.title: Reference Gallery
items.description: Access a library of reference images and tutorials to help with your creations.

items.title: Daily Challenges
items.description: Participate in daily and weekly art challenges to improve your skills and win recognition.

items.title: Community Showcase
items.description: Share your artwork and see what others have created from similar prompts.

items.title: Progress Tracking
items.description: Track your artistic growth with a personal portfolio and achievement system.

items.title: Art Tutorials
items.description: Access beginner to advanced tutorials for different drawing styles and techniques.

testimonial.name: testimonial
testimonial.title: What Artists Say
testimonial.description: Hear from artists who've transformed their creative process with RandomDraw.

items.title: Sarah Johnson
items.description: RandomDraw helped me overcome my creative block. I use it every day for warm-up sketches and now I never run out of ideas!
items.label: Professional Illustrator

items.title: Mark Zhang
items.description: As an art teacher, I use RandomDraw in my classroom to give students unique projects. It's a game-changer for keeping lessons fresh and engaging.
items.label: Art Educator

items.title: Emma Davis
items.description: The daily challenges have significantly improved my skills. In just three months, I can see a huge difference in my artwork quality and creativity.
items.label: Beginner Artist

items.title: What is RandomDraw?
items.description: RandomDraw is a platform that generates random drawing ideas and inspiration for artists of all skill levels. It helps overcome creative block by providing customizable prompts for your next artistic creation.

items.title: Is RandomDraw suitable for beginners?
items.description: Absolutely! RandomDraw offers difficulty settings from beginner to advanced, so you can get ideas that match your current skill level and gradually challenge yourself as you improve.

items.title: Can I save my favorite ideas?
items.description: Yes, with a free account you can save your favorite drawing ideas to revisit later. Premium members can create custom collections of saved ideas.

items.title: How do the daily challenges work?
items.description: Each day, we post a new challenge prompt. You create artwork based on the prompt and submit it before the deadline. Community members can like and comment on submissions, and selected works are featured in our gallery.

items.title: Can I use the artwork I create commercially?
items.description: Yes, all artwork you create using RandomDraw prompts belongs to you. You're free to use it for personal or commercial purposes.

items.title: Do you offer refunds?
items.description: We offer a 7-day money-back guarantee for paid subscriptions if you're not satisfied with the service.
